thread.title: Fantastic hotel, convenient location, even street parking for the savvy!
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel, convenient location, even street parking for the savvy! - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Maura H
title: Fantastic hotel, convenient location, even street parking for the savvy!
text:
Easy to find, really friendly, helpful staff, beautiful clean room, great mattress, large separate shower with rainforest head and handheld spray as well, separate wc, and sink with amazing makeup mirror right in the room. Very stylish room, with good temperature controls, innovative lighting arrangements, all around a great experience. Highly recommend. Easy walk to several subway lines, and even found on street parking, although had to sit out a 90 minute period for street cleaning, like all the other locals. Oh, and delicious pastries in the morning, with coffee/tea all day.
Room Tip: king rooms face street, queen rooms a little quieter in back, but either great, we tried both! See more room tips
